name: ART NOW II
description:
This artwork was made in 2015 using watercolor on a paper of 15 cm in diameter. This artwork marks my chosen transition period from works that tend to be illustrative to focus on the portraits of realist face.

This artwork contains five portraits of great artists with various styles they pioneers on painting background. Then one potrait was not recognized with a plain background as a representation of the question of who would be the next age and major artists, the portrait could be me or you who still struggled with our respective processes. But, is it an artist must be a marker of a certain stream? What streams are still so important?

Fadhlilabdi
